languages.text: "Ваше признание в совершении ошибки похвально, хотя и лишено сколько-то значимого веса в оправдании деяний".
"Your admission of error is commendable, although it offers little of substance to justify your actions."
languages.original_text: "Ваше признание в совершении ошибки похвально, хотя и лишено сколько-то значимого веса в оправдании деяний".

traits.locale_text: "Your admission of error is commendable, although it offers little of substance to justify your actions."
"Your admission of error is commendable, although it offers little of substance to justify your actions."
"Your admission of error is commendable, although it offers little of substance to justify your actions."
"Your admission of error is commendable, although it offers little of substance to justify your actions."
"Your admission of error is commendable, although it offers little of substance to justify your actions."

languages.text: "Dass Ihr Eure Fehler eingesteht, ist lobenswert, bietet aber nur wenig Substanz, um Euer Handeln zu rechtfertigen."
languages.original_text: "Your admission of error is commendable, although it offers little of substance to justify your actions."

traits.locale_text: "Dass Ihr Eure Fehler eingesteht, ist lobenswert, bietet aber nur wenig Substanz, um Euer Handeln zu rechtfertigen."

languages.text: « La reconnaissance de votre erreur est louable, mais elle n'apporte que peu d'éléments venant justifier vos actes. »
languages.original_text: "Your admission of error is commendable, although it offers little of substance to justify your actions."

traits.locale_text: « La reconnaissance de votre erreur est louable, mais elle n'apporte que peu d'éléments venant justifier vos actes. »

languages.text: “你愿意承认错误的态度值得赞许，但这并不能证明你的行为是正当的。”
languages.original_text: "Your admission of error is commendable, although it offers little of substance to justify your actions."

traits.locale_text: “你愿意承认错误的态度值得赞许，但这并不能证明你的行为是正当的。”

languages.text: «Es admirable que admita su error, pero no ofrece una defensa sustancial para sus actos».
languages.original_text: "Your admission of error is commendable, although it offers little of substance to justify your actions."

traits.locale_text: «Es admirable que admita su error, pero no ofrece una defensa sustancial para sus actos».

languages.text: 「過ちを認めることは称賛に値しますが、あなたの行動を正当化するには、ほとんど説得力を持ちません」
languages.original_text: "Your admission of error is commendable, although it offers little of substance to justify your actions."

traits.locale_text: 「過ちを認めることは称賛に値しますが、あなたの行動を正当化するには、ほとんど説得力を持ちません」

languages.text: "Hatanı kabul edişin takdire şayan olsa da yaptıklarını meşru kılmaya yetmez."
languages.original_text: "Your admission of error is commendable, although it offers little of substance to justify your actions."

traits.locale_text: "Hatanı kabul edişin takdire şayan, ancak yaptıklarını meşru kılmaya yetmez."
